seed_pair.known: I'm not going to be able to remember easily.
seed_pair.target: No voy a poder recordar fácilmente.

S0014: Do you speak Spanish all day?
S0015: And I want you to speak Spanish with me tomorrow.
Y quiero que hables español conmigo mañana.
S0016: He wants to come back with everyone else later on.
Él quiere volver con todos los demás más tarde.
S0017: She wants to find out what the answer is.
Ella quiere descubrir cuál es la respuesta.
S0018: We want to meet at six o'clock this evening.
Queremos reunirnos a las seis esta noche.
S0019: But I don't want to stop talking.
Pero no quiero parar de hablar.
S0020: You want to learn his name quickly.
S0021: Why are you learning her name?
S0022: Because I want to meet people who speak Spanish.
Porque quiero encontrar personas que hablan español.
S0023: I'm going to start talking more soon.
Voy a comenzar a hablar más pronto.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs sentences as natural language pattern examples
_instructions.lego_coverage_requirement: Practice phrases MUST use at least 60% of the LEGOs listed in recent_seed_pairs[seed_id][1]
_instructions.vocabulary_source: Prioritize LEGOs from recent_seed_pairs[seed_id][1] + current_seed_legos_available, then any words from sentences
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
